code: export var ADD_TODO='ADD_TODO';export var DELETE_ALL='DELETE_ALL';export var REMOVE_TODO='REMOVE_TODO';export var UPDATE_TODO='UPDATE_TODO';export var UPDATE_CHECKBOX='UPDATE_CHECKBOX';export var addTodo=function addTodo(payload){return{type:ADD_TODO,payload:payload};};export var deleteAll=function deleteAll(payload){return{type:DELETE_ALL};};export var removeTodo=function removeTodo(payload){return{type:REMOVE_TODO,payload:payload};};export var handleEditSubmit=function handleEditSubmit(payload){return{type:UPDATE_TODO,payload:payload};};export var handleCheckbox=function handleCheckbox(payload){return{type:UPDATE_CHECKBOX,payload:payload};};
